description.en:
Komodo is an end-to-end blockchain infrastructure solutions provider. Consistently recognized as one of the worldâ€™s most innovative blockchain projects, Komodo is developing technologies at the cutting-edge of the blockchain industry. 

In reality, most blockchain platforms today are but a single blockchain that offers support for smart contracts and decentralized applications. This model forces all projects to share the same infrastructure, leading to congestion, increased transactions fees, and stifled growth. 

Whereas other blockchain platforms employ a single, shared-blockchain model, Komodoâ€™s federated multi-chain architecture provides each and every external project with independent infrastructure and a dedicated blockchain. 

This multi-chain design is what makes Komodo unique among blockchain platforms. Each project is given the opportunity to create their own blockchain ecosystem via Komodoâ€™s infinitely scalable infrastructure. 

Komodoâ€™s tech enables seamless cross-chain interoperability among all federated blockchains. Every blockchain built with Komodo is also connected to 95% of chains outside the federation via atomic swap technology. Future plans are in place for blockchain bridging support, which will create cross-chain fungibility throughout the entire blockchains industry. 

Moreover, with Komodoâ€™s architecture, multiple blockchains can sync up and function as a single chain. If one chain is not meeting performance needs, additional chains can be added to form a blockchain cluster. A blockchain cluster boosts performance linearly without inflating coin supply or devaluing the currency. 

The Komodo ecosystem is not only scalable and interoperable, itâ€™s also secured with the power of the Bitcoin network. This is accomplished with a series of cross-chain notarizations that store a blockhash onto the Bitcoin ledger every ten minutes, providing protection from 51% attacks. 

Join Komodo as we continue to accelerate the global adoption of blockchain technology.

ico_data.short_desc: We provide security, freedom and independence to all people through blockchain technology to create a flourishing, decentralized world.

status_updates.description:
Merhaba TÃ¼rkiye! ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·

We are happy to announce that our website is now available in Turkish! - Komodo, blokzincir teknolojisi sektÃ¶rÃ¼nde en hÄ±zlÄ± bÃ¼yÃ¼yen Ã¼lkelerin baÅŸÄ±nda yer alan TÃ¼rkiye ile buluÅŸuyor!

komodoplatform.com/tr/

Hello everyone! I hope you've all had a great weekend!

Komodo CTO Kadan Stadelmann sat down for a superb interview with Andy Pickering from Brave New Coin. He talks about his past and his background as a white-hat hacker, describes Komodo's vision, and explains why AtomicDEX is the industry leader today.

Listen to the podcast here.
https://bravenewcoin.com/insights/podcasts/atomic-dex-how-the-komodo-decentralized-exchange-enables-atomic-swaps

The Komodo team is excited to report that a stablecoin suite is now listed for trading on AtomicDEX. 

Five stablecoinsâ€” USD Coin (USDC), True USD (TUSD), Dai Stablecoin (DAI), Paxos (PAX), and Binance USD (BUSD)â€” are now available for peer-to-peer trading on AtomicDEX via Komodoâ€™s industry-leading atomic swap technology.

Read more here.
https://komodoplatform.com/stablecoin-suite-atomicdex/

Learn more about the engine that powers the AtomicDEX protocol.

This blog post will explain in great detail Market Maker 2, the underlying protocol that powers secure, peer-to-peer atomic swaps on AtomicDEX.

komodoplatform.com/market-maker-2-overview/

Komodo's Lead Developer James 'jl777' Lee recently developed a solution to the Difficulty Strand Attack called Adaptive Proof of Work (APoW). 

Learn more here.

https://komodoplatform.com/adaptive-proof-of-work/

We are very excited to announce the public beta phase of AtomicDEX, the industry's only mobile-native decentralized exchange built on anything-to-anything, asset-agnostic atomic swaps. This represents a generational change in atomic swap technology. 

Sign up at https://atomicdex.io, be one of the first to test AtomicDEX, and join us as we continue to revolutionize the blockchain space.

Atomic swaps were, for many years, the Holy Grail of our industry. We've just published a comprehensive history of atomic swap technology for researchers and analysts.

Read more:
komodoplatform.com/komodo-and-the-early-pioneers-of-atomic-swaps
